inferno.name: Inferno

backstory.origin: Inferno was once a regular German Shepherd, loyal and brave, until he was caught in a supernatural rift between HellNet and the human world. When the rift closed, Inferno was imbued with demonic power, transforming into a Hellhound under Riff’s command. Though he still looks like a normal dog, Inferno is a force of nature, able to sense evil and supernatural forces from miles away.
backstory.bond_with_riff: Inferno and Riff share an unbreakable bond, with Inferno acting as Riff’s backup in chaotic situations. Inferno’s ability to sense danger and his demonic loyalty make him indispensable to Riff’s missions.

personality: Brave in the face of danger
dislikes: Being bossed around by the Glitch Lords

primary.name: Evil Sense
primary.description: Inferno can sense evil and supernatural entities over long distances. His eyes glow a deep red when evil is near, and he can lead Riff straight to the source of bad vibes or supernatural disturbances.

secondary.name: Reality Bark
secondary.description: Inferno’s bark can destabilize glitchy digital realities, causing corrupted data zones to collapse or reveal hidden pathways. This ability comes in handy when navigating HellNet’s dangerous zones or unmasking supernatural threats.

secondary.name: Shadow Step
secondary.description: Inferno can teleport short distances through shadows, making him an expert at sneaking up on enemies or dodging attacks. This makes him a valuable asset during surprise attacks or ambushes.

secondary.name: Soul Fetch
secondary.description: Inferno can retrieve objects or even 'fetch' the souls of weakened enemies. If Riff needs something brought to him or an enemy subdued, Inferno is the perfect companion to get the job done.

default_form.description: Inferno appears as a sleek, black-furred German Shepherd with glowing red eyes and faint fiery markings along his fur. His collar is made of molten iron, symbolizing his connection to the underworld. Despite his intimidating appearance, Inferno is as playful as any dog—when he's not hunting evil.

transformation.name: Hellhound Form
transformation.description: In battle or during intense moments, Inferno transforms into a larger, more menacing Hellhound with flaming paws, glowing red eyes, and a molten aura surrounding him. In this form, Inferno’s powers are amplified, and he can tear through enemies or digital barriers with ease.

companionship_with_riff.description: Inferno and Riff’s relationship is unbreakable, forged through countless battles, pranks, and parties. Inferno often acts as Riff’s emotional anchor, keeping him grounded when things get too chaotic. Their playful dynamic adds a fun twist to their adventures, with Inferno often acting as the straight man to Riff’s wild antics.

abilities_in_combat.tactical_support: Inferno often supports Riff during combat by using his abilities to destabilize enemy forces, disrupt glitchy areas, or retrieve important objects during missions.

offensive_abilities.description: Inferno can charge at enemies, leaving a trail of fire behind him. This ability causes fire-based damage and destabilizes the environment, making it harder for enemies to move.
Inferno’s howl summons demonic flames that surround him and Riff, damaging enemies and protecting them from immediate threats.

party_mode.description: At parties, Inferno becomes a lovable mascot, howling along with the music and occasionally adding his own supernatural flair to the event. Whether he’s catching flying Soulbits or sneaking into the rave’s most restricted areas, Inferno is always the life of the party.

catchphrases: Who's a good boy? Oh right, you're a Hellhound.
You sense something evil, boy? Lead the way, Inferno.

meta.project: D3M0N AI - The Metaverse Demon Bouncer
